message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product for $9,500. I believe it will be highly beneficial for you.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,200. I'm willing to pay that amount for it.
Thanks for your interest, Bob. I appreciate your offer, but I can't go lower than $9,000.  I know it's valuable to you, and I'm sure we can find a price that works for both of us.
I'm still not convinced that $9,000 is the best price for this product. I'm willing to pay $8,500 for it, and I think that's a fair price considering its value to me.
